attributes.action: children under 5 should not live above the 5th floor without double glazed windows
attributes.additional_details: children under 5 should not live above the 5th floor without double glazed windows, its health and safety. my 2 year old stands up at my windows which are old crittall windows and i'm on the 11th floor. when i complain to havering council they say children can live on any floor, please help me change this rule before a child gets hurt
